scenario_text.value:
Syakomon... Why would she say such awful things
out of the blue like that?
Don’t worry, that wasn’t the real Syakomon.

Yeah. Fakes like that showed up for me, Aoi,
and Saki too. The girls are resting now.

They changed into their partners and said
terrible things, all for Arukenimon’s trap.
B-but that looked like Syakomon to me!

They all look exactly the same as the real
deal. The rest of us got tricked, too.

Talking to them makes the difference clear.
It’s okay, Miu. We’ll find the real Syakomon.

Yeah... Yeah, I’ll search out the real
Syakomon!

A fake Syakomon... I don’t want to deal with
enemies like that.
